thread.title: K.Ghani

author: K.Ghani
title: K.Ghani
text: My purchase went not so well as I have to return them due to the artwork has no artist signature. On the front, side or back. The communication was very clear and professional from the start. However, there were some delay in the transportation. The pick up date was delayed from 10th Jan to 15th Jan. Upon arrival, I found that the artwork was rolled tightly without protective layer (not as recommended) and was not signed at all which was unacceptable (to me). Saatchi team, has been very helpful and professional throughout the process of returning the artwork, providing option for courier pickup or drop off at the DHL centre. I hope for the refund process to be quick, professional and satisfying too. One small suggestion, is to provide a note section during the ordering process so the buyer could request the artist to make sure certain particulars such as signature or packing method is met with satisfaction.
